diary.text: The Expedition arrived safe and happy back in Finland today after flying in from Spitzbergen via Oslo. After champagne, cakes and coffee, we held a well attended and successful press conference at ...

expedition.subHeader: Unsupported expedition to the North Pole
expedition.text: Airborne Ranger Club of Finland's expedition skied from Canadas Ward Hunt to the geographic North Pole during spring 2006. Expedition consisted of seven skiing expedition members, and a large group of support members...
